Multilevel Nav

A multilevel navigation solution that's under 10Kb (gzipped).

Demos

Dependencies

Minimum compatibile jQuery version is 3.3.1.

If using for navbar, include jquery.hoverIntent which fixes menu hover issues.

  None!

Installation

CSS Linkage

Include in HTML head

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="assets/css/multilevel-nav.css" />

JS Linkage

Add right before closing HTML body tag

<script src="assets/js/multilevel-nav.js"></script>

Call the plugin

multilevelNav('.selector-name');

JS Options

hoverIntent

Type: Boolean
Default: false

hoverIntentTimeout

Type: Number
Default: 250

Default jquery.hoverIntent timeout.

toggleOnClickOnly

Type: Boolean
Default: false

Access child menus only when user clicks menu item arrow. By default the menu opens on both hover and click on screen widths larger than the data-mln-breakpoint value.

autoDirection

Type: Boolean
Default: true

On larger screens, for menu items that are near the right edge of browser, the child menu will open to the right of the parent instead of the left.

activeSelector

Type: String
Default: '.active'

Class used for active element.

expandActiveItem

Type: Boolean
Default: false

Items with class "active" will be expanded on page load. If the item is apart of a child menu, the parent menus will be expanded all the way down to the active item.

wholeLinkToggler

Type: Boolean
Default: false

Clicking the whole link will toggle the child menu. This removes the ability to use the top level as an href. Use in conjunction with "toggleOnClickOnly" for best results.

topLevelWholeLinkToggler

Type: Boolean
Default: false

Only the top level link will do what is described in the option wholeLinkToggler.

childMenuTogglerSymbol

Type: String
Default: '<span class="mln__toggle-btn__chevron"></span>'

HTML that makes up the child menu toggle symbol

navbarMenuBackdrop

Type: Boolean
Default: false

A backdrop (shaded overlay) appears over the site when a menu is showing (only on screen widths larger than the data-mln-breakpoint value).

navbarMegaMenuBackdrop

Type: Boolean
Default: false

A backdrop (shaded overlay) appears over the site when a mega menu is showing (only on screen widths larger than the data-mln-breakpoint value).

expanderCloseOnInPageAnchorClick

Type: Boolean
Default: false

When in page anchor link is activated inside an active expander, the expander closes automatically.

menuCloseOnInPageAnchorClick

Type: Boolean
Default: false

When in page anchor link is activated inside an active menu, the menu closes automatically (only on screen widths larger than the data-mln-breakpoint value).

offCanvasScrollToActiveItem

Type: Boolean
Default: false

Use in conjunction with off canvas. On page load, the active menu item (in the off canvas), will be in view.

excludeLevel

Type: Number
Default: -1

Exclude specified level of child menu items from being expandable.

autoCloseInactiveMenu

Type: Boolean
Default: true

When tabbing out of active navbar menu, it automatically closes

CSS/Attribute Options

data-mln-breakpoint

Attribute used used for the navbar display as well as responsive expander display.

.mln--navbar

Class that adds responsive navgation.

.mln--expand-above-breakpoint

Class that closes expander on screen widths smaller than the data-mln-breakpoint value and opens expander on screen widths larger than the data-mln-breakpoint value.

CSS built from pre-processed SASS

Check out the _variables.scss partial for quick customizations.
